question:
Declare an integer variable called `num` 
and assign it the integer value 7.

Declare a floating-point variable called `pi` 
and assign it the value of $pi$ (3.14).

Declare a string variable called `message` 
and assign it the text of "Hello, Python!".

Declare a boolean variable called `is_raining` 
and assign it the value `True`.

Declare three integer variables (`a`, `b`, and `c`) 
and assign them values (1, 2, 3) in a single line.
